title: Polki & Emerald Teardrop Jhumka: A Regal Fusion
materials: and a central Emerald gemstone. Polki diamonds are meticulously set in an open setting to maximize their natural brilliance. Tiny diamonds accentuate the border
features: These Jhumkas showcase a timeless teardrop design. The upper portion features a triangular Polki arrangement, while the lower portion is a floral arrangement of Polki diamonds surrounding a vibrant teardrop-shaped Emerald. The open setting showcases the natural beauty of Polki diamonds, a hallmark of traditional Indian jewelry.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant green Emerald centerpiece and the icy white sparkle of Polki diamonds. This color palette symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaham)
and formal events. Equally stunning for a modern fusion look at parties or cultural gatherings.
description: This earring set embodies timeless elegance, blending the rich heritage of Polki diamond jewelry with a touch of vibrant emerald. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique luster, enhancing the overall appeal. A symbol of status and tradition, these Jhumkas will become a treasured heirloom.
